name: Conquer The Universe
description:
Conquer the Universe(CTU) is a Free To Play Idle Incremental game. Build up yourself a robot army and try to conquer the universe with endless grow.

  • Idle gameplay.
  • Regular updates.
  • Premium currency you can passively obtain at a decent pace, without paying a cent. Only toss me some cash because you want to, not because you need to in order to progress.
  • Build workers, gather gold.
  • Build the ultimate robot for combat.
  • Unlock even more content.
  • Defeat powerful bosses. Earn Anti Matter.
  • Rebuild spend your Anti Matter on your workers or your ultimate robot.
  • Automate your business.
  • Unlimited progress.
